page.title: 10THE ARMY IN CHESTERTON
page.content: Highfield House,once a private house, has been extended for use as Territorial Army Headquarters.It now has offices,stores,lecture rooms,a miniture range,drill hall,garages & a workshop.It is the HQ of the Royal Wessex Yeomanry,a home defence recconaissance regiment.It is responsible for training,direction & administration of the Royal Glos Hussars,Royal Wilts Yeomanry & Royal Devon Yeomanry Squadrons.Its staffed daily by members of the Regular Army, full-time Territorials & Civil Servants.The TA members train one evening a week & on certain weekends. There are vehicles & equipment also kept here for the Regiment.Many of the improvements to the site are as a result of the recent enhancement of the Territorial Army for its role in the defence of the UK in time of war.
